ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
HIV.C.DE78Zidovudine and lamivudine (AZT + 3TC)Backbone regimen for PEP for children - Zidovudine and lamivudine (AZT + 3TC)
HIV.C.DE79Abacavir and lamivudine (ABC + 3TC)Backbone regimen for PEP for children - Abacavir and lamivudine (ABC + 3TC)
HIV.C.DE80Tenofovir disoproxil and lamivudine (TDF + 3TC)Backbone regimen for PEP for children - Tenofovir disoproxil and lamivudine (TDF + 3TC)
HIV.C.DE81Tenofovir disoproxil and emtricitabine (TDF + FTC)Backbone regimen for PEP for children - Tenofovir disoproxil and emtricitabine (TDF + FTC)
HIV.C.DE82Third drug for HIV PEP for childrenBackbone regimen for PEP for children - Third drug for HIV PEP for children
HIV.C.DE83Dolutegravir (DTG)Backbone regimen for PEP for children - Dolutegravir (DTG)
HIV.C.DE84Atazanavir/ritonavir (ATV/r)Backbone regimen for PEP for children - Atazanavir/ritonavir (ATV/r)
HIV.C.DE85Lopinavir/ritonavir (LPV/r)Backbone regimen for PEP for children - Lopinavir/ritonavir (LPV/r)
HIV.C.DE86Darunavir/ritonavir (DRV/r)Backbone regimen for PEP for children - Darunavir/ritonavir (DRV/r)
HIV.C.DE87Ritonavir (RTV)Backbone regimen for PEP for children - Ritonavir (RTV)

title.value: Backbone regimen for PEP for children Codes
